xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.12 Hetuduka, Parittattika » 1.12.3 Appamāṇapada » 1.12.3.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Parittattika
Appamāṇapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
379.
810Hetu appamāṇo dhammo hetussa appamāṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
380.
811Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
812Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
813Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
814(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
815Hetudukaparittattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetvādiup1.13 Hetuduka, Parittārammaṇattika >>
